data.name: TextProperties
desc: This is a set of properties to describe the style for rendering the text area inside a shape.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.2

properties.name: IsNumbering
desc: If this is TRUE, numbering is ON for the text of this Shape.

properties.name: NumberingRules
desc: describes the numbering levels.
The different rules accessible with this com.sun.star.container.XIndexReplace interface are sequences of property values as described in the service com.sun.star.style.NumberingRule.

properties.name: TextAnimationAmount
desc: This is the number of pixels the text is moved in each animation step.

properties.name: TextAnimationCount
desc: This number defines how many times the text animation is repeated.
If this is set to zero, the repeat is endless.

properties.name: TextAnimationDelay
desc: This is the delay in thousandths of a second between each of the animation steps.

properties.name: TextAnimationDirection
desc: This enumeration defines the direction in which the text moves.

properties.name: TextAnimationKind
desc: This value defines the type of animation.

properties.name: TextAnimationStartInside
desc: If this value is TRUE, the text is visible at the start of the animation.

properties.name: TextAnimationStopInside
desc: If this value is TRUE, the text is visible at the end of the animation.

properties.name: TextAutoGrowHeight
desc: If this value is TRUE, the height of the Shape is automatically expanded/shrunk when text is added to or removed from the Shape.

properties.name: TextAutoGrowWidth
desc: If this value is TRUE, the width of the Shape is automatically expanded/shrunk when text is added to or removed from the Shape.

properties.name: TextColumns
desc: Column layout properties for the text.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.2

properties.name: TextContourFrame
desc: If this value is TRUE, the left edge of every line of text is aligned with the left edge of this Shape.

properties.name: TextFitToSize
desc: With this set to a value other than NONE, the text inside of the Shape is stretched or scaled to fit into the Shape.

properties.name: TextHorizontalAdjust
desc: adjusts the horizontal position of the text inside of the Shape.

properties.name: TextLeftDistance
desc: This is the distance from the left edge of the Shape to the left edge of the text.
This is only useful if Text.TextHorizontalAdjust is BLOCK or STRETCH or if Text.TextFitSize is TRUE.

properties.name: TextLowerDistance
desc: This is the distance from the lower edge of the Shape to the lower edge of the text.
This is only useful if Text.TextVerticalAdjust is BLOCK or if Text.TextFitSize is TRUE.

properties.name: TextMaximumFrameHeight
desc: with this property you can set the maximum height for a shape with text.
On edit, the auto grow feature will not grow the object higher than the value of this property.

properties.name: TextMaximumFrameWidth
desc: with this property you can set the maximum width for a shape with text.
On edit, the auto grow feature will not grow the objects wider than the value of this property.

properties.name: TextMinimumFrameHeight
desc: with this property you can set the minimum height for a shape with text.
On edit, the auto grow feature will not shrink the objects height smaller than the value of this property.

properties.name: TextMinimumFrameWidth
desc: with this property you can set the minimum width for a shape with text.
On edit, the auto grow feature will not shrink the object width smaller than the value of this property.

properties.name: TextRightDistance
desc: This is the distance from the right edge of the Shape to the right edge of the text.
This is only useful if Text.TextHorizontalAdjust is BLOCK or STRETCH or if Text.TextFitSize is TRUE.

properties.name: TextUpperDistance
desc: This is the distance from the upper edge of the Shape to the upper edge of the text.
This is only useful if Text.TextVerticalAdjust is BLOCK or if Text.TextFitSize is TRUE.

properties.name: TextVerticalAdjust
desc: adjusts the vertical position of the text inside of the Shape.

properties.name: TextWritingMode
desc: This value selects the writing mode for the text.
